ORDERWORKFLOWEXECHISTORY_SEARCH_WHERE.Statement: WHERE ( 1 = 1 <@@hasval:shop_id@@> AND (w2_OrderWorkflowExecHistory.shop_id = @shop_id) </@@hasval:shop_id@@> <@@hasval:workflow_kbn@@> AND (w2_OrderWorkflowExecHistory.workflow_kbn = @workflow_kbn) </@@hasval:workflow_kbn@@> <@@hasval:workflow_no@@> AND (w2_OrderWorkflowExecHistory.workflow_no = @workflow_no) </@@hasval:workflow_no@@> <@@hasval:scenario_setting_id@@> AND (w2_OrderWorkflowExecHistory.scenario_setting_id = @scenario_setting_id) </@@hasval:scenario_setting_id@@> <@@hasval:exec_status@@> AND (w2_OrderWorkflowExecHistory.exec_status IN (@@ exec_status @@)) </@@hasval:exec_status@@> <@@hasval:exec_place@@> AND (w2_OrderWorkflowExecHistory.exec_place IN(@@ exec_place @@)) </@@hasval:exec_place@@> <@@hasval:exec_timing@@> AND (w2_OrderWorkflowExecHistory.exec_timing IN(@@ exec_timing @@)) </@@hasval:exec_timing@@> <@@hasval:workflow_type@@> AND (w2_OrderWorkflowExecHistory.workflow_type IN(@@ workflow_type @@)) </@@hasval:workflow_type@@> <@@hasval:date_from@@> AND (w2_OrderWorkflowExecHistory.date_created >= @date_from) </@@hasval:date_from@@> <@@hasval:date_to@@> AND (w2_OrderWorkflowExecHistory.date_created < @date_to) </@@hasval:date_to@@> )
